question: Which is the national sport of Latvia?
explanation: Ice Hockey is the national sport of Latvia. Ice hockey is usually considered the most popular sport in Latvia. Latvia has had many famous hockey stars like Helmuts Balderis, Arturs Irbe, Karlis Skrastins and Sandis Ozolins and more recently Zemgus Girgensons, whom the Latvian people have strongly supported in international and NHL play expressed through the dedication of using the NHL's All-Star Voting to bring Zemgus to number one in voting.
